title: 28: Boyfriend Update
description:
IN CASE you want to know if he's cheating on you...we've got you covered. And we’re cheating back!
This week Sofia gives us a MAJOR relationship update involving her upcoming move back to New York City, which is causing quite the riff in her relationship. It’s no big deal though because Queen Sloot is getting BACK in the game and she needs to know…how far is too far? Is flirting REALLY cheating? Don’t lie, we’ve all done it. Joined by her cousin Alex, Sofia teaches another illustrious Sloot University lesson and this one…has a scent?
Sofia also lets us in on a BRAND NEW hack to catch your sleazy boyfriend cheating. These b*tches are!
Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
